{{cpp/title|copyable}}
{{cpp/concepts/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=concepts|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept copyable =
    std::copy_constructible&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp;
    std::movable&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp;
    std::assignable_from&lt;T&amp;, T&amp;&gt; &amp;&amp;
    std::assignable_from&lt;T&amp;, const T&amp;&gt; &amp;&amp;
    std::assignable_from&lt;T&amp;, const T&gt;;
}}

The concept {{tt|copyable&lt;T&gt;}} specifies that {{tt|T}} is a {{lconcept|movable}} object type that can also be copied (that is, it supports copy construction and copy assignment).
